price: Na sε wͻhunu nsεnkyerεnee bi a wͻtwe wͻn ho (fri ho), na wͻka sε: ”Woi yε nkonyaa anaa naadaasεm a εbɛtwa mu“.
arabic: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ ءَايَةٗ يُعۡرِضُواْ وَيَقُولُواْ سِحۡرٞ مُّسۡتَمِرّٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-in yaraw āyatan yuʿ'riḍū wayaqūlū siḥ'run mus'tamirrun
